Generate java controllers and models based on the following swagger yaml:

openapi: 3.0.3
servers:
  - description: Web Service Gateway API
    url: https://wsg-vzw-nab-api01.api.synchronoss.net

info:
  description: This document describes the various API's for the Synchronoss Network Address Book Web Services. This API is a RESTful API which returns XML and WBXML objects. Developers must make sure to read and understand the backward compatibility requirements as described in the WSG Backward Compatibility document.
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Synchronoss Network Address Book Web Services API

paths:
  /wsg/public/nab/v1/group/{cloudOwnerID}/members:
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post Group Members 1
      description: The owner of a shared cloud can call this api to add members instantly, if they are on the same VZ billing account; or to send invites to anyone, VZ customer or not.
                   Add one or more members to a group.
            
                   Members can be added instantly, or invited to join via email/SMS.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: cloudOwnerID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943412
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization
          description: userType can be MDN/CID/OTT
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: Basic base64Encode(userType|ownerUserId:nabToken)
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Accept
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: Content
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: accept-encoding
          description: Not required if its SSO access
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: gzip, deflate
        - name: x-sncr-client-version
          description: Not required if its SSO access
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: The version number of Client
        - name: X-SNCR-app-id
          description: Can be guid
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: uniq Id to represent the device
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        description: |
          These properties appear in the request body, to describe each group member being added to a group
          | Name       | Required | Allowed Values                    | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
          |------------|----------|-----------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
          | userType   | Y        | "MDN" "EMAIL"                     | The customer ID type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
          | userId     | Y        | (any VZW MDN) (any email address) | The customer ID                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
          | type       | Y        | "member"                          | ??                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
          | status     | Y        | "invite" "enrollBillingMember"    | An instruction for how to add this member "invite": NAB will send an invitation to the given MDN or email address, to join the shared cloud group "enrollBillingMember": NAB will add the given MDN to the shared cloud group, instantly and without any invite or notification, provided they are in the same VZ billing account as the shared cloud subscriber |
          | attributes | N        | "*":"*"                           | Technically any name/value pairs can be added using this field, but in practice, it is used to assign the member a nickname via attribute "display.name"                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: string
            example:
              members:
                - userId: '15782943413'
                  userType: MDN
                  type: member
                  status: Invite
                  attributes:
                    display.name: user name
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  members:
                    - userId: '15782943413'
                      type: member
                      status: Invited
                      userType: MDN
                      attributes:
                        display.name: user name
                  status:
                    code: '4000'
                    msg: Success
        '404':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                Group Account Not Found:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "8000",
                        "msg": "Group Account not found"
                      }
                    }
                userNotFound:
                  value: |-
                    {
                              "status": {
                                "code": "8010",
                                "msg": "user not found"
                              }
                            }
        '412':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                rpgAccountAlreadyExists:
                  value: |-
                    {
                              "status": {
                                "code": "8015",
                                "msg": "rpg account already exists in media, this member can't be enrolled"
                              }
                            }
        '422':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                jsonIsNotValid:
                  value: |-
                    {
                              "status": {
                                "code": "8001",
                                "msg": "JSON is not valid"
                              }
                            }
                internalServerError:
                  value: |-
                    {
                              "status": {
                                "code": "4001",
                                "msg": "Internal Server Error"
                              }
                            }
                mandatoryFieldsMissing:
                  value: |-
                    {
                              "status": {
                                "code": "4011",
                                "msg": "Mandatory fields missing"
                              }
                            }
                oneOrMoreInviteesFailed:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "8004",
                        "msg": "one or more invitees failed"
                      }
                    }
                invalidUserType:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "8011",
                        "msg": "invalid user type"
                      }
                    }
                unprocessableEntity:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "8012",
                        "msg": "unprocessable entity"
                      }
                    }
                addMemberToGroupFailed:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "8013",
                        "msg": "add member to group failed"
                      }
                    }
                spgBillingFailed:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "8014",
                        "msg": "spg billing failed"
                      }
                    }
                groupIsFull:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "8016",
                        "msg": "group is full"
                      }
                    }
        '500':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                internalServerError:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "5000",
                        "msg": "Internal Server Error"
                      }
                    }
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Group members 2
      description: "The owner of a shared cloud can call this api to list all its members.\n\n
  
                   The owner of a shared cloud can also call this api (with an extra query param) to list MDNs on their VZ account, which are eligible to be added as members."
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: cloudOwnerID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943412
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization
          description: userType can be MDN/CID/OTT
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: Basic base64Encode(userType|ownerUserId:nabToken)
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Accept
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: Content
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: accept-encoding
          description: Not required if its SSO access
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: gzip, deflate
        - name: x-sncr-client-version
          description: Not required if its SSO access
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: The version number of Client
        - name: X-SNCR-app-id
          description: Can be guid
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: uniq Id to represent the device
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: | 
                      These properties appear in the response body, to describe each member in the group
            
                      | Name       | Required | Allowed Values                                                 | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
                      |------------|----------|----------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
                      | attributes | N        | "*":"*"                                                        | If the member has a nickname, it should appear as an attribute "display.name"                                                                                                                                                               |
                      | status     | Y        | "Invited" "Accepted" "NotAccepted"                             | The status of the membership "Invited": NAB has sent an invite, but it has not yet been accepted "Accepted": either the invite was accepted, or the member was enrolled instantly; either way the member now has access to the shared cloud |
                      | type       | Y        | "owner" "manager" "member"                                     | ??                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
                      | userId     | Y        | (any VZW MDN) (any VZT CID) (any OTT GUID) (any email address) | The customer ID                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
                      | userType   | Y        | "MDN" "CID" "OTT" "EMAIL"                                      | The customer ID type                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  members:
                    - userId: '15782943412'
                      type: owner
                      status: Accepted
                      userType: MDN
                      attributes:
                        lcid: 686732e99f3c4a0da5aaba2a9324d11b
                        service.level: VD2
                        quota.used: '0'
                        display.name: '15782943412'
                    - userId: '15782943413'
                      type: member
                      status: Invited
                      userType: MDN
                      attributes:
                        lcid: f2d408df1e5a4ff3ac37d4968dc61aa7
                        service.level: VL9
                        display.name: user name
                        quota.used: '0'
                        display.name.alias: '15782943413'
                  status:
                    code: '4000'
                    msg: Success
        '400':
          description: ''
          content:

              examples:

    put:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Put Group Members 3
      description: "The owner of a shared cloud can call this api to update one or more of its members.
                    Update members in a group \n\n
                    The update can be one of: \n\n
                    
                    * status=ReInvite: resend the invite \n\n
                    * status=Update: update the member's nickname (by setting attribute \"display.name\") \n\n
                    * status=Enroll: instantly enroll a new member (legacy logic for Family Cloud)"
      requestBody:
        content:
          'application/json':
            schema:
              type: string
              example:
                members:
                  - userId: '15782943413'
                    userType: MDN
                    type: member
                    status: Update
                    attributes:
                      display.name: user name new
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]

            Basic

          in: header

            type: string
          example: Basic base64Encode(userType|ownerUserId:nabToken)
        - name: Authorization-domain

          schema:

    delete:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Delete Group Members 4
      description: "The owner of a shared cloud can call this api to remove accepted members, and to cancel invites.\n\n
                    When a member is removed from a shared cloud, the group data are updated in NAB and GQM, then the cloud (media) account is archived, and the NAB account status changed to ContactsOnly (if wireless).\n\n
                    To remove specific members from a group, the client must call this api with a payload listing those members.\n\n
                    To dismantle the whole group, the client must call this api without any payload.\n\n
                    Note: this api usually removes members completely from the group data, but Family Cloud is a special case, because we cannot cancel their entitlement to a shared cloud in Verizon; hence if this api is used to removed a Family Cloud user from a group, they will remain in the group data with status \"NotAccepted\"
                    \n\n
                    Remove one or more members from a group\n\n
                    Members who were enrolled, or who have accepted their invite, can be removed; unaccepted invites can be cancelled\n\n"
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: cloudOwnerID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943412
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization
          description: userType can be MDN/CID/OTT
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: Basic base64Encode(userType|ownerUserId:nabToken)
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Accept
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: Content
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: accept-encoding
          description: Not required if its SSO access
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: gzip, deflate
        - name: x-sncr-client-version
          description: Not required if its SSO access
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: The version number of Client
        - name: X-SNCR-app-id
          description: Can be guid
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: uniq Id to represent the device
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        description: |
          These properties appear in the request body, to describe each group member being removed from a group
          
          | Name       | Required | Allowed Values                                                 | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
          |------------|----------|----------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
          | userId     | Y        | (any VZW MDN) (any VZT CID) (any OTT GUID) (any email address) | The customer ID                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
          | userType   | Y        | "MDN" "CID" "OTT" "EMAIL"                                      | The customer ID type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
          | type       | Y        | "owner" "manager" "member"                                     | ??                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
          | status     | Y        | "cancelInvite" "remove"                                        | An instruction for how to remove this member "cancelInvite": NAB will cancel the unaccepted invite(s); if an invitee tries to accept later, they will see an error "remove": NAB will remove the accepted / enrolled member(s), instantly freeing up seat(s) in the group, and archiving the given cloud account(s) |
          | attributes | N        | "*":"*"                                                        | Not used                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
        content:
          'application/json':
            schema:
              type: string
              example:
                  {
                    "members": [
                      {
                        "userId": "19986068231",
                        "userType": "MDN",
                        "type": "owner",
                        "status": "remove"

                      },
                      {
                        "userId": "vdrivetest@gmail.com",
                        "userType": "EMAIL",
                        "type": "member",
                        "status": "cancelInvite"
                      },
                      {
                        "userId": "VZID001003",
                        "userType": "CID",
                        "type": "member",
                        "status": "remove"
                      },
                      {
                        "userId": "b68668e7-c8f1-4bb0-9429-b9af0782e410",
                        "userType": "OTT",
                        "type": "manager",
                        "status": "remove"
                      }
                    ]
                  }
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  status:
                    code: '4000'
                    msg: Success
  /wsg/public/nab/v1/familycloud/{userId}/members:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      security:
        - familyCloudAuth: [ ]
      summary: Get Family Cloud Members 6
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943414
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get Family Cloud Members
                example:
                  familyCloudGroupMembers:
                    - mdn: '15782943414'
                      type: owner
                      status: NotAccepted
                      attributes:
                        lcid: ed6312deec624b10a1736c5eb7d3050b
                        service.level: FC2
                        quota.used: '0'
                  status:
                    code: '4000'
                    msg: Success
        '422':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                fcsAccountNotFound:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "8000",
                        "message": "FCS Account not found"
                      }
                    }
                internalServerError:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "4001",
                        "message": "Internal Server Error"
                      }
                    }
    put:
      tags:
        - default
      security:
        - familyCloudAuth: [ ]
      summary: Put update Family Cloud Members 7
      description: "The only Owner can update member details from manage family screen and the details that can be updated are status/display name.\n\n 

                    * The owner can update owners display name\n\n
                    * The owner can update the member display name/update status to Invite/Cancel Invite\n\n
                    * The owner can update the member plan type . In the request if plan.type =Hexagon , then account gets updated with FH2 Feature code, else account will be updated in FC2.\n\n"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                {
                  "members": [
                    {
                      "mdn": "15782943415", ##required
                      "status": "Enroll", ##required
                      "attributes": { ##optional
                        "display.name": "name1",
                        "plan.type": "Hexagon"
                      }
                    }
                  ]
                }
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          description: Owner Mdn
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943414
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  status:
                    code: '4000'
                    msg: Success
        '422':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                mandatoryFieldsMissing:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "4011",
                        "msg": "Mandatory fields missing"
                      }
                    }

                jsonIsNotValid:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "8001",
                        "msg": "JSON is not valid"
                      }
                    }
                internalServerError:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "4001",
                        "msg": "Internal Server Error"
                      }
                    }
    delete:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Delete Family Cloud Members 8 pending
      description: "The owner can remove FamilyCloudAccepted member/all members from the group. Deleted member/members will be available in the NotAccepted list after removing.\n\n
                    When Owner removes the member from the family cloud, member's media account will be archived and put into ContactsOnly mode and member entry will be removed from Media(Yet to decide API).\n\n
                    To dismantle all the members from the family, the client should not send the payload. If payload exists then the members from payload will only be considered.\n\n"
      security:
        - familyCloudAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          description: Owner Mdn
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943414
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header

            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic

        content:
          'application/json':
            schema:
              type: string
              example:
                {
                  "members": [
                    {
                      "mdn": "15782943087", ##required
                      "status": "NotAccepted",  ##optional
                    }
                  ]
                }

        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:

              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  status:
                    code: '4000'
                    msg: Success

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/endpoints/{endPointId}:
    get:
      summary: Get endpoints endPointId pending not executed 9
      tags:
        - default
      description: |
        This method is used for retrieving a endpoint information includes pc client auto sync attributes, mobile client state attributes, upgrade info attributes based on userId and endpoint id.

        PC Client Upgrade Detection Attributes.
        | UPGRADE INFO ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | READONLY |
        |-------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------|
        | upgrade.status          | The status of the upgrade. This can be either none, recommended or mandatory. If the status is none then it means that no upgrade is present for the endpoint. In this case the upgrade message and download URL will not be present. | Yes      |
        | upgrade.message         | The upgrade message.                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Yes      |
        | upgrade.download.url    | The upgrade download URL.                                                                                                                                                                                                             | Yes      |

        Mobile client state attributes
        | PHONE STATE                                                                            | GET ENDPOINTS RESPONSE                                                                                          |
        |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
        | User has a phone in the normal state i.e. it has been provisioned and is ready to sync | device.status=ACTIVE device.customer.model=empty or unavailable in the response device.client.support=SUPPORTED |
        | User switches to new phone. Client is supported on the new phone.                      | No phone device will be returned.                                                                               |
        | User switches to new phone. Client is NOT supported on the new phone.                  | No phone device will be returned.                                                                               |
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: upgrade
          description: Get the upgrade information for the device .Values for upgrade param are true , default value is false
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: true
        - name: attributes
          description: List endpoint attributes which are needs to be displayed for the endpoint.
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: attributeslist
        - name: supportedFields
          description: Flag to filter endpoint supported contact fields. Default value is true
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
          example: true
        - name: autopromote
          description: Flag to filter endpoint autopromote settings info . Default value is true
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
          example: true
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic

        '301':
          description: User is in Different PU
        '400':
          description: Bad Url Syntax
        '401':
          description: Authentication Failed
        '403':
          description: Authorization Failed
        '404':
          description: Resource Not Found
        '405':
          description: Method Not Found
        '409':
          description: Resource access Conflict
        '422':
          description: Bad Request Semantics
        '500':
          description: Internal Server Error

      summary: Delete endpoints endPointId pending not executed 10
      tags:
        - default
      description: This method is used for deleting an endpoint for the specified userId and endpoint id.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:

          in: path
          required: true

            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416

          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==

          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/account/tokens:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Account Tokens 12 pending
      description: This method is used to retrieve the account tokens for the specified userid.
      security:
        - tokenAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: timestamp
          description: The timestamp is the timestamp generated by the client in GMT and should approximately match the server time in GMT A variation of 10 minutes is okay
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 1361441112170
        - name: signature
          description: Client will send signature which will match against server generated signature if matches then get tokens resoponse will be returned else error .
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: bsPYD9C1W9lF7Oa/dOQJlT5
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: vzw.portal.sso
        - name: Content
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: Basic MTU3ODI5NDMwNTU6MTIzNA==
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Get Account tokens 200 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get Account tokens 200 response
              examples:
                Success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

  /wsg/public/nab/v3/{userId}/account/tokens:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Account Tokens 12 pending
      description: "Get account tokens Version3 api will return the addressType and lcid along with the tokens .This address type will be used to identify the type of user and this will used for further server calls.\n\n
                    AUTHORIZATION DOMAIN \n\n
                    Request with vzw.portal.sso domain will authorize user with SAM server . Request with vzt.portal.sso domain will authorize user with VZT auth server . Request with vz.domain will authorize the user with SAM sever first , if it fails then it will authorize against VZT auth server."
      security:
        - tokenAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: timestamp
          description: The timestamp is the timestamp generated by the client in GMT and should approximately match the server time in GMT A variation of 10 minutes is okay
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 1361441112170
        - name: signature
          description: Client will send signature which will match against server generated signature if matches then get tokens resoponse will be returned else error .
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: bsPYD9C1W9lF7Oa/dOQJlT5
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: vzw.portal.sso
        - name: Content
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: Basic MTU3ODI5NDMwNTU6MTIzNA==
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Get Account tokens 200 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object

                    	<ns1:status>
                    		<ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                    		<ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                    	</ns1:status>

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/account/tokens/notification:
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Account Tokens notification 13 pending
      description: This method is used for sending secret key and access code for the user as an app directed SMS.
      security:
        - tokenAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: vzw.portal.sso
        - name: Content
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: Basic MTU3ODI5NDMwNTU6MTIzNA==
      requestBody:
        description: |-
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS      | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION     | REQUIRED |
          |---------------|------------|-----------------|----------|
          | platform      |            | client platform | YES      |
          | clientversion |            | client version  | YES      |
          | deviceaddress |            | mdn             | YES      |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Get Account Tokens notification request
            example: >-
                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                  <f1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-request xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 AddAcctTokenAuthNtfnRequest.xsd ">
                    <f1:platform>android</f1:platform>
                    <f1:clientversion>BASS 2.9.0.0</f1:clientversion>
                    <f1:deviceaddress>14088916608</f1:deviceaddress>
                  </f1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-request>
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Get Account Tokens notification 200 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get Account Tokens notification 200 response
              examples:
                Success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountTokenAuthNotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response>
        '301':
          description: User is in Different PU
        '403':
          description: Get Account tokens notification 403 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get Account tokens notification 403 response
              examples:
                Authorization Failed:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountTokenAuthNotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>4004</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Authorization Failed</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response>
        '422':
          description: Get Account tokens notification 422 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get Account tokens notification 422 response
              examples:
                Client won't support app directed notification.:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountTokenAuthNotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>7501</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Client won't support app directed notification.</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response>
                Client version is missing.:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountTokenAuthNotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>7502</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Client version is missing.</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response>
                Client platform missing.:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountTokenAuthNotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>7503</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Client platform missing.</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response>
                Device address is missing.:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountTokenAuthNotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>7504</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Device address is missing.</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response>
                Error while sending account auth token notification.:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountTokenAuthNotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>7507</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Error while sending account auth token notification.</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response>
        '500':
          description: Get Account tokens notification 500 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get Account tokens notification 500 response
              examples:
                Unknown error:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountTokenAuthNotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>-1</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Unknown error</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response>
                Internal Server Error:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountTokenAuthNotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>4001</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Internal Server Error</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:add-acct-token-auth-ntfn-response>
  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/preferences:
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post Preferences 16
      description: Creates an entry in NAB with the preference submitted by the user
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: string
              example:
                {
                  "dataclasses": {
                    "contacts": "enabled",
                    "photos": "enabled",
                    "videos": "disabled"
                  }
                }
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
              type: string
          example: 15782943080
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: X-SNCR-Client-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET;iOS;13.3.1
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  status:
                    code: '4000'
                    msg: Success
        '404':
          description: Preference Not Found
        '400':
          description: Bad request
        '500':
          description: Internal Server error
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Preferences 14
      description: Returns JSON response with a preference which was submitted by the user
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 15782943080
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: X-SNCR-Client-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET;iOS;13.3.1
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  dataclasses:
                    contacts: enabled
                    photos: enabled
                    videos: disabled
        '404':
          description: Matching data not found
        '400':
          description: Bad request
        '422':
          description: Unprocessable Entity
        '500':
          description: Internal Server error
    put:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Put Preferences 15
      description: Creates an entry in NAB with the preference submitted by the user
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: string

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/raf/{referrerUserId}/referral:
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post Raf Create Referral 17
      description: "API is used to create a referral code for a single referee at once.\n\n
                    Query params supported:\n\n
                    eligibilityCheck=true - To perform DVS eligibility check to determine whether or not MDN is a Verizon customer"
      requestBody:
        description: |
                    Fields
                    | Field Name     | Field type and value(s)       | Description |
                    |----------------|-------------------------------|-------------|
                    | refereeType    | String(MDN/CID/OTT)           |             |
                    | refereeUserId  | String(valid UserId)          |             |
                    | refereeName    | String(any)                   |             |
                    | referralStatus | String(pending/sent/redeemed) |             |
                    | referralLink   | String(Absolute link)         |             |
                    | referralCode   | String(Encrypted code)        |             |
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: string
              example:
                refereeType: MDN
                refereeUserId: '15782943080'
                refereeName: '15782943080'
                referralStatus: PENDING
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: referrerUserId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 15782943079
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Accept
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
        - name: eligibilityCheck
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  referralCode: UFZUd21KK3hKNWpRVEE3MGtlVGJqQT09
                  referralLink: https://govzw.com/XZqlgDUe
                  referralStatus: PENDING
                  status:
                    code: '200'
                    msg: SUCCESS
        '412':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                notVerizonCustomer:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "3001",
                        "msg": "Ineligible: Not a Verizon customer"
                      }
                    }
                referralLimitExceeded:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "3002",
                        "msg": "referral limit exceeded"
                      }
                    }
                premiumCloudPlan:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "3003",
                        "msg": "Ineligible: Premium Cloud Plan"
                      }
                    }
                freeCloudMembership:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "3004",
                        "msg": "Ineligible: Free Cloud-membership"
                      }
                    }
                archivedCloud:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "3005",
                        "msg": "Ineligible: Archived Cloud"
                      }
                    }

                prepaidCustomer:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "3006",
                        "msg": "Ineligible: Prepaid Customer"
                      }
                    }

                accountOwnerHasPremiumCloud:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "3007",
                        "msg": "Ineligible: Account Owner has Premium Cloud"
                      }
                    }
        '422':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                systemErrorOccurred:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "3008",
                        "msg": "System Error Occurred"
                      }
                    }
                useridMismatched:
                  value: |-
                    {
                      "status": {
                        "code": "4541",
                        "msg": "Userid mismatched"
                      }
                    }

            type: string

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/buddies:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Buddies pending not excecuted 21
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: status
          description: "Obtains the buddies filtered by status \n
                        NOTE :
                        1. Status parameter to be given within these states : invited,incoming-invitation
                        buddy,rejected."
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: buddy
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: buddy invitation 200 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Post create shares by share id members success response
              examples:
                success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:buddies-get-response xsi:schemaLocation="BuddiesGetResponse.xsd" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                        <ns1:f1account userid="15782943416">
                            <ns1:buddies ns1:itemcount="2">
                                <ns1:buddy status="incoming-invitation" userid="14082821251" contactid="00000000000000000000000000000000" buddyuserid="14082821250">
                                    <ns1:created>2010-04-23T19:20:49.000Z</ns1:created>
                                    <ns1:modified>2010-04-23T19:20:49.000Z</ns1:modified>
                                </ns1:buddy>
                                <ns1:buddy status="buddy" userid="14082821251" contactid="7d235be2-0121-1000-83dc-75a1da67af7c" buddyuserid="19880179584">
                                    <ns1:created>2009-06-15T06:25:06.000Z</ns1:created>
                                    <ns1:modified>2009-06-15T06:25:47.000Z</ns1:modified>
                                </ns1:buddy>
                                <ns1:meta>
                                    <ns1:partial-data>false</ns1:partial-data>
                                    <ns1:content-len>2</ns1:content-len>
                                </ns1:meta>
                            </ns1:buddies>
                        </ns1:f1account>
                    </ns1:buddies-get-response>
        '301':
          description: User is in Different PU
        '400':
          description: Bad Url Syntax
        '401':
          description: Authentication Failed
        '403':
          description: Authorization Failed
        '404':
          description: Resource Not Found
        '405':
          description: Method Not Found
        '409':
          description: Resource access Conflict
        '422':
          description: Bad Request Semantics
        '500':
          description: Internal Server Error
    put:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Put Buddies pending not executed 22
      description: |
        This method is used for modifying/deleting buddies. It allows you to accept or reject the buddy invitations that are sent to the user through the MODIFY operation. However, it should be noted that only the user that has received the invitation, can accept or reject the invitation. The DELETE operation can be used to break the buddy relationship once a buddy relationship is established.

        The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES:
        | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES  | DESCRIPTION                                                   | REQUIRED |
        |----------|-------------|---------------------------------------------------------------|----------|
        | DELETE   | buddyuserid | addresstype and userId of buddy to be deleted seperated by "  | "        |
        | DELETE   | contactid   | contactId of the Buddy                                        | NO       |
        | DELETE   | userid      | addresstype and userId of user seperated by "                 | "        |
        | DELETE   | status      | status of the Buddy                                           | NO       |
        | DELETE   | created     | created date of the Buddy                                     | NO       |
        | DELETE   | modified    | modified date of the Buddy                                    | NO       |
        | MODIFY   | buddyuserid | addresstype and userId of buddy to be modifled seperated by " | "        |
        | MODIFY   | contactid   | contactId of the Buddy                                        | NO       |
        | MODIFY   | userid      | addresstype and userId of user seperated by "                 | "        |
        | MODIFY   | status      | status of the Buddy                                           | NO       |
        | MODIFY   | created     | created date of the Buddy                                     | NO       |
        | MODIFY   | modified    | modified date of the Buddy                                    | NO       |
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: buddy invitation request
            examples:
              Accept a buddy invitation by modifying the incoming buddy invitation request:
                value: >-
                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                   <f1:buddies-modify-operations xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 src/main/schema/nabapps/BuddiesOperationsRequest.xsd ">
                     <f1:MODIFY>
                       <f1:buddie buddyuserid="MDN|14082821250" contactid="f381b52a012810008c667cc97a183218" status="buddy" userid="14082821251" xsi:type="f1:BuddyType">
                       </f1:buddie>
                     </f1:MODIFY>
                   </f1:buddies-modify-operations>
              Breaking the buddy relationship using the delete operation request:
                value: >-
                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                   <f1:buddies-modify-operations xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 src/main/schema/nabapps/BuddiesOperationsRequest.xsd ">
                     <f1:MODIFY>
                       <f1:buddie buddyuserid="MDN|14082821250" contactid="f381b52a012810008c667cc97a183218" status="buddy" userid="14082821251" xsi:type="f1:BuddyType">
                       </f1:buddie>
                     </f1:MODIFY>
                   </f1:buddies-modify-operations>
      responses:
        '200':
          description: buddy invitation 200 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: buddy invitation 200 response
              examples:
                Response to the buddy accept request:

                             <ns1:buddie>

    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post Buddies pending not executed 23
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      description: |
        This method is used for inviting a buddy. User has a choice of changing the visibility of his profile. If the user has turned off the visibility of his profile then trying to invite the user will return an error. This check may be restricted to certain plans depending on the business requirements. 

        The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES:
        | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES  | DESCRIPTION                                                 | REQUIRED |
        |----------|-------------|-------------------------------------------------------------|----------|
        | buddie   | buddyuserid | addresstype and userId of buddy to be addded seperated by " | "        |
        | buddie   | contactid   | contactId of the Buddy                                      | NO       |
        | buddie   | userid      | addresstype and userId of user seperated by "               | "        |
        | buddie   | status      | status of the Buddy                                         | NO       |
        | created  |             | created date of the Buddy                                   | NO       |
        | modified |             | modified date of the Buddy                                  | NO       |
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
        - name: manageStorage
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
          example: 'true'
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: inviting a buddy request
            examples:
              MODIFY SHARELINKS:
                value: >-
                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                  <f1:buddie-add-operations xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 src/main/schema/nabapps/BuddiesAddOperationsRequest.xsd ">
                    <f1:ADD>
                      <f1:buddie buddyuserid="MDN|14082821251" contactid="f381b52a012810008c5a7cc97a183218" status="invited" userid="14082821250" xsi:type="f1:BuddyType">
                        <f1:created>2001-12-31T12:00:00</f1:created>
                        <f1:modified>2001-12-31T12:00:00</f1:modified>
                      </f1:buddie>
                    </f1:ADD>
                  </f1:buddie-add-operations>
      responses:
        '200':
          description: inviting a buddy 200 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: inviting a buddy 200 response
              examples:
                success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:buddies-add-response userid="14082821250" xsi:schemaLocation="BuddiesAddOperationsResponse.xsd" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                        <ns1:ADD-STATUS>
                            <ns1:buddie>
                                <ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                                <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                                <ns1:buddy status="invited" userid="14082821250"
                                contactid="f381b52a012810008c5a7cc97a183218" buddyuserid="14082821251"/>
                            </ns1:buddie>
                        </ns1:ADD-STATUS>
                    </ns1:buddies-add-response>
                Mandatory fields missing:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:buddies-add-response userid="14082821250" xsi:schemaLocation="BuddiesAddOperationsResponse.xsd" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                        <ns1:ADD-STATUS>
                            <ns1:buddie>
                                <ns1:code>4011</ns1:code>
                                <ns1:msg>Mandatory fields missing</ns1:msg>
                            </ns1:buddie>
                        </ns1:ADD-STATUS>
                    </ns1:buddies-add-response>

                        <ns1:ADD-STATUS>
                            <ns1:buddie>

                type: object

          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-

            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==

            type: string
          example: sncr.token

          example: >-

        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic

            type: string
          example: sncr.token

          in: header

          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic

          description: "Group element will hold two guids: a) id represent the nab guid b) itemGuid represents to the syncserver/middle guid\n\n

                      <ns1:partial-data>false</ns1:partial-data>
                      <ns1:content-len>2</ns1:content-len>
                    </ns1:meta>

                    <ns1:group contactcount="0" name="School Friends" version="2" type="web" id="93bacd45018a10008019e2dfd9194cfe" itemGuid="3852e19c18320640ae4dfba45f80e332" addressbookname="default"/>

          description: User is in Different PU
