          description: Internal Server Error
    put:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Put modify Address Book Groups 25
      description: |
                This method is used for modifying the group. A group can only be renamed. Modifying the group name will result in change to the version number of the group.
                INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
                The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
                | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION                      | REQUIRED |
                |----------|------------|----------------------------------|----------|
                | group    | type       | group-data element,type of group | YES      |
                | group    | id         | id of the group                  | YES      |
                | group    | name       | name of the group                | YES      |
                | group    | version    | version of the group             | YES      |
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Put update profile request
              example: >-
                <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                <f1:group-modify-request xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 GroupModifyRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                    <f1:group type="web id="1111" name="xyz" version="1"/>
                </f1:group-modify-request>
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: groupId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            70453a48018a1000803ca7bd15edf04f
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: success response
              examples:
                Success response:
                  value: >-

                        <f1:status>
                            <f1:code>4000</f1:code>
                            <f1:msg>success</f1:msg>
                            <f1:group type="web" id="2222" name="xyz" version="1"/>
                        </f1:status>
                    </f1:group-modify-response>
        '301':

    delete:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Delete address book group by group id 25 pending
      description: This method is used for deleting a group. Deleting a group will remove it from all the contacts that added the group. This call will end up modifying the contacts that have the group.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: groupId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            70453a48018a1000803ca7bd15edf04f

        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The response for deleting a group show the contacts associated with the group as the version of the contacts also gets modified.

            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: group delete response
              examples:
                Success response:
                  value: >-

                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                        <ns1:group id="588e9ab3012710008013d465c343c2f3" name="Fusionone"/>
                        <ns1:modifiedcontacts>
                            <ns1:contact id="588e9ab3012710008011d465c343c2f3" version="5"/>
                            <ns1:contact id="588e9ab3012710008010d465c343c2f3" version="3"/>
                        </ns1:modifiedcontacts>
                    </ns1:group-delete-response>
        '301':
          description: group delete 301 response
          content:

              schema:
                type: object

                  name: group delete 301 response
              examples:
                User is in Different PU:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:group-delete-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" userid="19833317027" xsi:schemaLocation="GroupDeleteResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>4008</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>User is not authorized to access data</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:group-delete-response>
        '404':
          description: group delete 404 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: group delete 404 response
              examples:
                GroupId not found:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

                        <ns1:status>

                            <ns1:msg>GroupId not found</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:group-delete-response>
        '422':
          description: group delete 422 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object

                  name: group delete 422 response
              examples:
                Error in parsing the version to a numeric value:
                  value: >-

                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:group-delete-response>

                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:group-delete-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" userid="19833317027" xsi:schemaLocation="GroupDeleteResponse.xsd">

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/ab/groups:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Create Address Book Groups 26
      description: This method is used for retrieving multiple groups.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: groupType
          description: Type of Group,type which can be specified as web or mobile Default is all.
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            all:
              value: all
            web:
              value: web
            mobile:
              value: mobile
        - name: type
          description: Addressbook name will be specified for retrieveing groups, Default is null or default addressbook.
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: addressbookname OR all default null
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Group element will hold two guids: a) id represent the nab guid b) itemGuid represents to the syncserver/middle guid\n\n
                        ItemGuid will be shown in the getGroup/s response after the sync to middle."
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Create Address Book Group request
              examples:
                  Success response:
                    value: >-
                        <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>

                          <ns1:meta>
                            <ns1:partial-data>false</ns1:partial-data>
                            <ns1:content-len>2</ns1:content-len>
                          </ns1:meta>
                          <ns1:group contactcount="1" name="Fusionone" version="2" type="web" id="70453a48018a1000803ca7bd15edf04f" itemGuid="b468cb61a31f924bb67a66f3b45beb53" addressbookname="default"/>
                          <ns1:group contactcount="0" name="School Friends" version="2" type="web" id="93bacd45018a10008019e2dfd9194cfe" itemGuid="3852e19c18320640ae4dfba45f80e332" addressbookname="default"/>
                        </ns1:groups-get-response>
                  type all response:

                              <ns1:partial-data>false</ns1:partial-data>

                          <ns1:group addressbookname="jsmith@google.com" contactcount="1" id="abab8ff401441000800ad66831830ecf" name="DELL" type="mobile" version="1"/>

                      </ns1:groups-get-response>

                      </ns1:groups-get-response>

          description: User is in Different PU

          description: Bad Url Syntax

          description: Authentication Failed

    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post Create Address Book Groups 26
      description: This method is used for adding multiple groups. You can also add the groups to multiple contacts in the same call by specifying multiple contact references.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION                      | REQUIRED |
          |----------|------------|----------------------------------|----------|
          | group    | type       | group-data element,type of group | YES      |
          | group    | name       | name of group                    | YES      |
          | group    | tempid     | tempid of group                  | YES      |
          | group    | itemGuid   | Group item guid                  | NO       |
          | contact  | id         | contact-data element,contact-id  | NO       |
          | contact  | tempid     | tempid of contact                | NO       |
          | contact  | version    | contact version                  | NO       |

          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object

                    </f1:group>

    put:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Put Create Address Book Groups 26
      description: This method is used for modifying the groups. Please note that multiple operations are supported. You can either delete groups, modify groups, add multiple groups to multiple contacts and delete groups from multiple contacts.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      requestBody:
        description: |
          FOLLOWING OPERATIONS ARE SUPPORTED DELETE GROUP,MODIFY GROUP,ADD-CONTACT and DELETE-CONTACT TO GROUPS

          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS       | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION                      | REQUIRED |
          |----------------|------------|----------------------------------|----------|
          | delete-group   | type       | group-data element,type of group | YES      |
          | delete-group   | id         | id of the group                  | YES      |
          | delete-group   | name       | name of the group                | YES      |
          | delete-group   | version    | version of the group             | YES      |
          | modify-group   | type       | group-data element,type of group | YES      |
          | modify-group   | id         | id of the group                  | YES      |
          | modify-group   | name       | name of the group                | YES      |
          | modify-group   | version    | version of the group             | YES      |
          | add-contact    | type       | group-data element,type of group | OPTIONAL |
          | add-contact    | id         | id of the group                  | OPTIONAL |
          | add-contact    | name       | name of the group                | NO       |
          | add-contact    | version    | version of the group             | OPTIONAL |
          | delete-contact | type       | group-data element,type of group | OPTIONAL |
          | delete-contact | id         | id of the group                  | OPTIONAL |
          | delete-contact | name       | name of the group                | NO       |
          | delete-contact | version    | version of the group             | OPTIONAL |

          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Create Address Book Group request
              example: >-
                <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/ab/group:
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post Create Address Book Group 27
      description: This method is used for adding a new group. You can also add this group to multiple contacts in the same call by specifying multiple contact references. If you specify contact references, the adding of new group and adding the group to multiple contacts will be performed as a single transaction.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION                      | REQUIRED |
          |----------|------------|----------------------------------|----------|
          | group    | type       | group-data element,type of group | YES      |
          | group    | name       | name of group                    | YES      |
          | group    | tempid     | tempid of group                  | YES      |
          | group    | itemGuid   | Group item guid                  | NO       |
          | contact  | id         | contact-data element,contact-id  | NO       |
          | contact  | tempid     | tempid of contact                | NO       |
          | contact  | version    | contact version                  | NO       |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Create Address Book Group request
              example: >-
                <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                <f1:group-add-request xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 GroupAddRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                    <f1:group type="web" name="School Friends">
                        <f1:contact id="6886e444018a1000804719694a8e19d6" version="1"/>
                    </f1:group>
                </f1:group-add-request>
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Create Address Book Group response

          description: Groupname already exists

                type: object

                  name: Groupname already exists

                    <ns1:msg>Groupname already exists</ns1:msg>
                    </ns1:status>

    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Shares by share id address book contacts 30 not executed pending
      description: This method is used for adding contacts to share
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: shareId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            f5fcf563018a10008020ca0e9b5d70bf
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS           | ATTRIBUTES   | DESCRIPTION                                                 | REQUIRED |
          |--------------------|--------------|-------------------------------------------------------------|----------|
          | share-contacts-add | contact      | contact to be added to share                                | NO       |
          | share-contacts-add | contactref   | contact copy to be added to share                           | NO       |
          | share-contacts-add | contactlink  | contact link to AB added to share                           | NO       |
          | contact            | version      | version of the contact                                      | optional |
          | contact            | id           | id of the contact                                           | optional |
          | contact            | tempid       | tempid of the contact                                       | optional |
          | firstname          |              | First Name of the contact                                   | NO       |
          | lastname           |              | Last Name of the contact                                    | NO       |
          | middlename         |              | Middle Name of the contact                                  | NO       |
          | nameprefix         |              | NamePrefix of contact                                       | NO       |
          | namesuffix         |              | NameSuffix of contact                                       | NO       |
          | nickname           |              | Nickname of contact                                         | NO       |
          | birthday           |              | Birthdate of contact                                        | NO       |
          | source             |              | The source from where the contact originated.               | NO       |
          | endpointassoc      | endpointtype | EndpoinType of contact                                      | NO       |
          | endpointassoc      | endpointid   | EndpoinId of contact                                        | NO       |
          | buddyassoc         | buddyuserid  | Buddy UserId of contact                                     | NO       |
          | shareassoc         | id           | ShareId associated with contact                             | NO       |
          | shareassoc         | name         | ShareName associated with contact                           | NO       |
          | prefmodeofcontact  | type         | The type of preferred mode of communication for the contact | NO       |
          | prefmodeofcontact  | value        | The preferred mode of communication for the contact         | NO       |
          | conflicttype       |              | Conflict Type of contact                                    | NO       |
          | incaseofemergency  |              | Specifies contact as ICE or not                             | NO       |
          | favorite           |              | Specifies contact as favourite                              | NO       |
          | photo              | ContentType  | Photo of contact                                            | NO       |
          | anniversary        |              | Marriage anniversary date                                   | NO       |
          | spouse             |              | Spouse of contact                                           | NO       |
          | children           |              | Children Names of contact                                   | NO       |
          | note               |              | Note for the contact                                        | NO       |
          | orgname            |              | Company Name of contact                                     | NO       |
          | orgunit            |              | Company Department of contact                               | NO       |
          | jobtitle           |              | Job titile of contact                                       | NO       |
          | profession         |              | Profession of contact                                       | NO       |
          | assistant          |              | Assistant Name of contact                                   | NO       |
          | gender             |              | Gender of the contact                                       | NO       |
          | relationship       |              | Relationship of the contact with the person                 | NO       |
          | maritalstatus      |              | Marital status of the contact                               | NO       |
          | timezone           |              | Timezone of the contact                                     | NO       |

          | modified           |              | Modified date of contact                                    | NO       |

          | tel                | indx         | Telephone indx of contact                                   | NO       |

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/shares:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Shares 31 not executed pending
      description: This method is used for adding a buddy
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: visibility
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            public:
              value: public
            private:
              value: private
          description: Filter the shares by visibility of. If not specified, both public and private shares that the user is a member of (owned/subscribed/invited/rejected/requested) are returned.
        - name: membership-status
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            invited:
              value: '.invited
          description: Filter the shares by membership-status. It is an or list delimited by value owned not-member
        - name: rangebegin
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 0
          description: Specifies index of the starting item
        - name: maxnum
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 20
          description: Specifies maximum number of items to fetch. If visibility=public and membership-status is null or contains not-member, maxnum will be default to 100 if not specified.
        - name: name
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sharename
          description: Filter the shares by name field
        - name: description
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: desc
          description: Filter the shares by description field
        - name: pobox
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sharepobox
          description: Filter the shares by pobox field
        - name: apartment
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: apt
          description: Filter the shares by apartment field
        - name: street
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 1%20Almaden%20Blvd
          description: Filter the shares by street field
        - name: city
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: Miami
          description: Filter the shares by city field
        - name: state
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: CA
          description: Filter the shares by state field
        - name: zipcode
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 95131
          description: Filter the shares by zipcode field
        - name: country
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: US
          description: Filter the shares by country field
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            

      responses:
        '200':
          description: Get Address Book response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get shares response
                example: >-
                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                  <ns1:shares-response-get xsi:schemaLocation="ShareListGetResponse.xsd" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                      <ns1:f1account userid="14111222335">
                          <ns1:shares ns1:itemcount="1">
                              <ns1:share access-rights="moderate" creatorid="14111222335" id="a1237fbe012410008541be7358bd93f9" membership-status="owned" visibility="private">
                                  <ns1:name>My Family Share</ns1:name>
                                  <ns1:created>2009-11-04T11:10:30.000Z</ns1:created>
                                  <ns1:modified>2009-11-04T11:10:30.000Z</ns1:modified>
                              </ns1:share>
                                          <ns1:meta>
                                  <ns1:partial-data>false</ns1:partial-data>
                                  <ns1:content-len>1</ns1:content-len>
                              </ns1:meta>
                          </ns1:shares>
                      </ns1:f1account>
                  </ns1:shares-response-get>
        '301':
          description: User is in Different PU
          content:

              schema:
                type: object

                  name: User is in Different PU
                example: >-

    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post create Shares 32 not executed pending
      description: "This method is used for adding shares.\n\n
                    NOTE: While sending share invite to members,If the invited User has hidden his account then such requests are not processed. This condition valid only to ICS users for now"
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES  | DESCRIPTION                       | REQUIRED |
          |----------|-------------|-----------------------------------|----------|
          | share    | visibility  | Specifies share is private/public | NO       |
          | share    | tempid      | tempId of the share               | YES      |
          | share    | name        | share name                        | NO       |
          | share    | description | description of the share          | NO       |
          | share    | address     | address of the share              | NO       |
          | share    | members     | members of the share              | NO       |
          | share    | contacts    | contacts of the share             | NO       |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Create Address Book Group request
              example: >-
                <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                <f1:shares-add-request xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 F:\Divya\FusionOneSVN\server\branches\java\wsg-nab\src\main\schema\nabapps\SharesAddRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                        <f1:ADD>
                                <f1:share tempid="1" visibility="private">
                                        <f1:name>F1Share</f1:name>
                                        <f1:description>F1Share</f1:description>
                                        <f1:address type="home" indx="2">
                                                <f1:pobox>12</f1:pobox>
                                                <f1:street>Street</f1:street>
                                                <f1:apartment>Apartment</f1:apartment>
                                                <f1:city>city</f1:city>
                                                <f1:state>state</f1:state>
                                                <f1:zipcode>2</f1:zipcode>
                                                <f1:country>India</f1:country>
                                                <f1:preference>2</f1:preference>
                                        </f1:address>
                                </f1:share>
                        </f1:ADD>
                </f1:shares-add-request>

    put:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Put modify Shares 33 not executed pending
      description: |
        This method is used for performing different operations on shares

      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS    | ATTRIBUTES  | DESCRIPTION                                           | REQUIRED |
          |-------------|-------------|-------------------------------------------------------|----------|
          | DELETE      | id          | id of the share to be deleted                         | YES      |
          | MODIFY      | id          | id of the share to be modified                        | YES      |
          | MODIFY      | name        | name of the share                                     | NO       |
          | MODIFY      | description | description of the share                              | NO       |
          | MODIFY      | address     | address of the share                                  | NO       |
          | MODIFY      | replace     | boolean to specify the operation is modify or replace | optional |
          | REQUEST     | id          | id of the share                                       | YES      |
          | SUBSCRIBE   | id          | id of the share                                       | YES      |
          | UNSUBSCRIBE | id          | id of the share                                       | YES      |
          | REJECT      | id          | id of the share                                       | YES      |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Create Address Book Group request
              example: >-
                <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                <f1:shares-modify-request xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 F:\Divya\FusionOneSVN\server\branches\java\wsg-nab\src\main\schema\nabapps\SharesOperationsRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                    <f1:MODIFY replace="false">
                                <f1:share id="7d235be2-0121-1000-8b0e-75a1da67af7c">
                                        <f1:description>F1-Share</f1:description>
                                </f1:share>
                        </f1:MODIFY>
                </f1:shares-modify-request>

                        </ns1:MODIFY-STATUS>
                    </ns1:shares-modify-response>
                Share Id is not valid:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                    <ns1:shares-modify-response userid="19880179582" xsi:schemaLocation="SharesAddResponse.xsd" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                        <ns1:MODIFY-STATUS>
                            <ns1:status tempid="1" id="7d235be2-0121-1000-8b0e-75a1da67af7c">
                                <ns1:code>4033</ns1:code>
                                <ns1:msg>Share Id is not validd</ns1:msg>
                            </ns1:status>
                        </ns1:MODIFY-STATUS>
                    </ns1:shares-modify-response>
        '500':
          description: Unknown error
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object

                  name: Unknown error

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/shares/{shareId}/members:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Shares by share id members 34 not executed pending
      description: This method is used for getting share members
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: shareId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            f5fcf563018a10008020ca0e9b5d70bf
        - name: membership-status
          description: "NOTE :\n\n
                        1. Following values are only given for \"membership-status\" parameter:\n\n
                          all\n\n
                          invited\n\n
                          member
                          requested\n\n
                          rejected"
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            all:
              value: all
            invited:
              value: invited
            member:
              value: member
            requested:
              value: requested
            rejected:
              value: rejected
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            

      responses:
        '200':
          description: Get Address Book response

            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object

                      </ns1:f1account>

    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Shares by share id members 35 not executed pending
      description: |
        This method is used for adding share members
        
        NOTE: While sending share invite to members,If the invited User has hidden his account then such requests are not processed. This condition valid only to ICS users for now.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: shareId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            f5fcf563018a10008020ca0e9b5d70bf
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES        | DESCRIPTION                 | REQUIRED |
          |----------|-------------------|-----------------------------|----------|
          | ADD      | created           | created date of the member  | NO       |
          | ADD      | modified          | modified date of the member | NO       |
          | ADD      | contactid         | contactId of the member     | NO       |
          | ADD      | userid            | userId of the member        | YES      |
          | ADD      | membership-status | membership status           | NO       |
          | ADD      | access-rights     | access rights of the member | NO       |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Create Address Book Group request
              example: >-
                <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                <!--Sample XML file generated by XMLSpy v2009 (http://www.altova.com)-->

                    <f1:ADD>
                        <f1:member userid="14069034461" access-rights="view" membership-status="invited" contactid="3d134556f31g85h6r72432">

      tags:
        - default
      summary: Put modify Shares by share id members 36 not executed pending
      description: This method is used for modifying share members
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:

          in: path
          required: true

            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic

          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES        | DESCRIPTION                 | REQUIRED |
          |----------|-------------------|-----------------------------|----------|
          | DELETE   | created           | created date of the member  | NO       |
          | DELETE   | modified          | modified date of the member | NO       |
          | DELETE   | contactid         | contactId of the member     | NO       |
          | DELETE   | userid            | userId of the member        | YES      |
          | DELETE   | membership-status | membership status           | NO       |
          | DELETE   | access-rights     | access rights of the member | NO       |
          | MODIFY   | created           | created date of the member  | NO       |
          | MODIFY   | modified          | modified date of the member | NO       |
          | MODIFY   | contactid         | contactId of the member     | NO       |
          | MODIFY   | userid            | userId of the member        | YES      |
          | MODIFY   | membership-status | membership status           | NO       |
          | MODIFY   | access-rights     | access rights of the member | NO       |

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/alerts:
    description: "As different events happen in the system they may result in alerts for the user. For e.g. the user may change Google password resulting in an alert for him to modify his Google password in the system. The user may get invited to be a buddy with his friend or he may get invited to a share. All the relevant alerts are obtained through this API.\n\n
                  The Alerts Management API exposes the following Resources:"
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get user events 37 pending
      description:
        "This call allows client to retrieve a list of alerts in the system for both shares and buddies in a single request. Alerts can be retrieved from a specific date, to a specific date in the system. The dates can be passed in as parameters to the alerts retrieval call. The “from” and “to” date is specified in the “yyyyMMddHHmmss” format.\n\n
        Alerts are generated per user and can happen in the system due to the actions user takes or as a result of trying to sync data with other endpoints.\n\n
        Typically, alerts would be shown at login to the user. The state of some alerts might change due to user action. For e.g. if the user is invited to a share an alert will be generated. If the user accepts the invitation the alert will go away. Similarly if any of the endpoint has exceeded device capacity then an alert will be generated"
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: from
          description: "NOTE :\n\n
                        1. Date parameter to be given in the format:yyyyMMddHHmmss"
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            20230801000000
        - name: to
          description: "NOTE :\n\n
                        1. Date parameter to be given in the format:yyyyMMddHHmmss"
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            20230901000000
        - name: type
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: termsandconditions
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: get profile response
              examples:
                Success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:profile-get-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="ProfileGetResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:f1account userid="15782943416">
                            <ns1:profile>
                                <ns1:firstname>TestFName</ns1:firstname>
                                <ns1:lastname>TestLName</ns1:lastname>
                                <ns1:source>mbpim</ns1:source>
                                <ns1:created>2023-08-30T07:03:23.000Z</ns1:created>
                                <ns1:modified>2023-08-30T10:35:22.000Z</ns1:modified>
                                <ns1:incaseofemergency>false</ns1:incaseofemergency>
                                <ns1:favorite>false</ns1:favorite>
                                <ns1:dedupe>pending</ns1:dedupe>
                            </ns1:profile>
                        </ns1:f1account>
                    </ns1:profile-get-response>
        '301':
          description: User is in Different PU
        '400':
          description: Bad Url Syntax
        '401':
          description: Authentication Failed

    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post create user events 39
      description: | 
        This method is used for adding multiple events for user. Event attributes are added as a part of input xml. for.e.g: "termandconditions" event type is added for the user when he accepts the new "TOC"
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS       | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION                  | REQUIRED |
          |----------------|------------|------------------------------|----------|
          | add-user-event | event      | User event data root element | YES      |
          | event          | type       | Event type                   | YES      |
          | attribute      | name       | event attribute name         | NO       |
          | attribute      | value      | event attribute value        | NO       |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Put update profile request
              example: >-
                <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                <f1:add-user-event xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 AddUserEvent.xsd ">
                  <f1:event type="termsandconditions">
                    <f1:attribute name="termsandconditionsaccepted" value="true"/>
                    <f1:attribute name="termsandconditionsversion" value="V1" />
                    <f1:attribute name="termsandconditionsdate" value="03-07-2014" />
                  </f1:event>
                </f1:add-user-event>
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
          description: This request may also contain client version, client platform and umi in the HTTP request headers. This is mainly used to validate the existence of the event for particular client version
        - name: X-SNCR-Client-Version
          description: client version header from the client
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-SNCR-Client-Platform
          description: client platform header from the client
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-SNCR-Client-Model-Mapping
          description: client device UMI header from the client
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: update password response
              examples:
                Success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:events-add-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" userid="15782943416" xsi:schemaLocation="AddUserEventResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:event id="9802313">
                        <ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                        <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                      </ns1:event>
                    </ns1:events-add-response>
        '301':
          description: User is in Different PU
        '400':
          description: Bad Url Syntax
        '401':
          description: Authentication Failed
        '403':
          description: Authorization Failed
        '404':
          description: Resource Not Found
        '405':
          description: Method Not Found
        '409':
          description: Resource access Conflict
        '422':
          description: Bad Request Semantics
        '500':
          description: Internal Server Error

      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post Create token account 51 pending
      description: This method is used to generate a token and called by the tablet device
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic

        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS      | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION                                       | REQUIRED |
          |---------------|------------|---------------------------------------------------|----------|
          | deviceaddress |            | the account alias for which token will be created | YES      |

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/ab/contacts/{contactId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get address book contacts by contact id 53
      description: |
        This method is used for retrieving a contact.If the contact's phone has an associated ICS account ,this information is displayed through the "account" element.The corresponding preference to show if the account is visible or not is retrieved from "useridhidden" attribute. The response also shows the dedupe type whether pending or completed through the "dedupe" attribute.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: contactId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            6886e444018a1000804719694a8e19d6
        - name: fields
          description: Obtains the contact with fields specified
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            comma separated field names
            e.g. /contacts/$ContactId?fields=firstname
        - name: ff
          description: Specifies whether fields should be excluded or included. Values can be exclude or include. Default is include.
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            /contacts/$ContactId?fields=lastname&ff=exclude
        - name: size
          description: Retrieves the contact's image with specified size
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            /contacts/$ContactId?size=100x200
        - name: imagetype
          description: Retrieves the contact's image with specified type.Default is na.
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            /contacts/$ContactId?imagetype=png
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get Account
              examples:
                Success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>

    put:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Put update address book contacts by contact id 53
      description: This method is used for modifying a contact
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS          | ATTRIBUTES  | DESCRIPTION                                                                                | REQUIRED |
          |-------------------|-------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------|
          | contact           | id          | Id of Contact                                                                              | YES      |
          | contact           | tempid      | Tempid of Contact                                                                          | OPTIONAL |
          | contact           | version     | Version of contact                                                                         | YES      |
          | firstname         |             | First Name of the contact                                                                  | NO       |
          | lastname          |             | Last Name of the contact                                                                   | NO       |
          | middlename        |             | Middle Name of the contact                                                                 | NO       |
          | nameprefix        |             | NamePrefix of contact                                                                      | NO       |
          | namesuffix        |             | NameSuffix of contact                                                                      | NO       |
          | nickname          |             | Nickname of contact                                                                        | NO       |
          | birthday          |             | Birthdate of contact                                                                       | NO       |
          | source            |             | The source from where the contact originated.                                              | RO       |
          | deletionsource    |             | Indicates the deletion source.                                                             | NO       |
          | endpointassoc     | type        | EndpoinType of contact                                                                     | RO       |
          | endpointassoc     | id          | EndpoinId of contact                                                                       | RO       |
          | endpointassoc     | name        | Endpoint name of contact                                                                   | NO       |
          | endpointassoc     | state       | Contact state to the endpoint The values might be promoted, demoted, propmote_pending etc. | NO       |
          | buddyassoc        | buddyuserid | Buddy UserId of contact                                                                    | RO       |
          | shareassoc        | id          | ShareId associated with contact                                                            | RO       |
          | shareassoc        | name        | ShareName associated with contact                                                          | RO       |
          | prefmodeofcontact | type        | The type of preferred mode of communication for the contact                                | NO       |
          | prefmodeofcontact | value       | The preferred mode of communication for the contact                                        | NO       |
          | conflicttype      |             | Conflict Type of contact                                                                   | RO       |
          | incaseofemergency |             | Specifies contact as ICE or not                                                            | NO       |
          | favorite          |             | Specifies contact as favourite                                                             | NO       |
          | photo             | ContentType | Photo of contact                                                                           | NO       |
          | photoreference    |             | Photo Reference or Picture ID                                                              | RO       |
          | anniversary       |             | Marriage anniversary date                                                                  | NO       |
          | spouse            |             | Spouse of contact                                                                          | NO       |
          | children          |             | Children Names of contact                                                                  | NO       |
          | note              |             | Note for the contact                                                                       | NO       |
          | orgname           |             | Company Name of contact                                                                    | NO       |
          | orgunit           |             | Company Department of contact                                                              | NO       |
          | jobtitle          |             | Job titile of contact                                                                      | NO       |
          | profession        |             | Profession of contact                                                                      | NO       |
          | assistant         |             | Assistant Name of contact                                                                  | NO       |
          | gender            |             | Gender of the contact                                                                      | NO       |
          | relationship      |             | Relationship of the contact with the person                                                | NO       |
          | maritalstatus     |             | Marital status of the contact                                                              | NO       |
          | timezone          |             | Timezone of the contact                                                                    | NO       |
          | created           |             | Created date of contact                                                                    | NO       |
          | modified          |             | Modified date of contact                                                                   | NO       |
          | tel               | type        | Telephone type of contact                                                                  | YES      |
          | tel               | indx        | Telephone indx of contact                                                                  | NO       |
          | number            |             | Telephone Number of contact                                                                | NO       |
          | carrier           |             | Telephone Carrier of contact                                                               | NO       |
          | preference        |             | Telephone Preference of contact                                                            | NO       |
          | email             | type        | Email Type of contact                                                                      | YES      |
          | email             | indx        | Email Indx of contact                                                                      | NO       |
          | address           |             | Email Address of contact                                                                   | NO       |
          | preference        |             | Email Preference of contact                                                                | NO       |
          | im                | type        | IM type of contact                                                                         | YES      |
          | address           |             | IM address of contact                                                                      | NO       |
          | preference        |             | IM preference of contact                                                                   | NO       |
          | address           | type        | Address type of the contact                                                                | YES      |
          | address           | indx        | Address indx of the contact                                                                | NO       |
          | pobox             |             | Post box number of the address                                                             | NO       |
          | street            |             | Street Number of the address                                                               | NO       |
          | apartment         |             | Apartment Number of the address                                                            | NO       |
          | city              |             | City of the address                                                                        | NO       |
          | state             |             | State of the address                                                                       | NO       |
          | zipcode           |             | Zipcode of the address                                                                     | NO       |
          | country           |             | Country of the address                                                                     | NO       |
          | preference        |             | Preference of the address                                                                  | NO       |

          | dedupe            |             | Dedupe status of the contact can be set to pending or completed                            | OPTIONAL |

          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Create Address book Contact request
              example: >-
                <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                <f1:contact-modify-request xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 ContactModifyRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

                          <f1:created>2023-08-30T11:38:57.000Z</f1:created>
                          <f1:modified>2023-08-30T11:39:07.000Z</f1:modified>
                          <f1:incaseofemergency>false</f1:incaseofemergency>

                            <f1:address>frank@unsc.com</f1:address>
                            <f1:preference>2</f1:preference>
                          </f1:email>

                            <f1:street>Cortana Avenue</f1:street>

                          <f1:itemguid>90ddeb951449f34d919bfcc3febade03</f1:itemguid>
                    </f1:contact>
                </f1:contact-modify-request>
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]

          in: path

            type: string
          example: >-

    delete:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Delete address book contacts by contact id 53
      description: This method is used for deleting a contact
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: contactId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            6886e444018a1000804619694a8e19d6
        - name: u
          description: Version for the contact
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 2
        - name: override
          description: "flag to check for the contact version\n\n
                        Note: Override flag is used as a parameter which set will not consider the version of the contact while deleting."
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
          example: false
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: contact delete 200 response
          content:

                type: object

                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
