                Invalid attribute:
                  value: >-

    put:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: post endpoints 68
      description: |
        This method is used for modify and delete the endpoints for user:

        | OPERATION | DESCRIPTION      |
        |-----------|------------------|
        | DELETE    | Delete endpoints |
        | MODIFY    | Modify endpoints |

        The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
        | ELEMENTS               | ATTRIBUTES           | DESCRIPTION                   | REQUIRED |
        |------------------------|----------------------|-------------------------------|----------|
        | Modify                 | endpoint             | endpoint for Modify           | OPTIONAL |
        | endpoint               | endpointtype         | End point type                | YES      |
        | endpoint               | endpointid           | End point id                  | YES      |
        | name                   |                      | Name of end point             | NO       |
        | username               |                      | User name of end point        | NO       |
        | password               |                      | Password of end point         | NO       |
        | attributes             | attribute            | supported attributes list     | OPTIONAL |
        | attribute              | value                | attribute vale                | OPTIONAL |
        | attribute              | name                 | attribute name                | OPTIONAL |
        | autopromote- endpoints | autopromote-endpoint | List of autopromote-endpoints | OPTIONAL |
        | autopromote- endpoint  | endpointid           | endpointid for auto-promote   | YES      |
        | autopromote- endpoint  | endpointtype         | endpointtype for auto-promote | YES      |
        | autopromote- endpoint  | autopromote          | Boolean value TRUE            | FALSE    |
        | Delete                 | endpoint             | endpoint for delete           | OPTIONAL |
        | endpoint               | endpointtype         | End point type                | YES      |
        | endpoint               | endpointid           | End point id                  | YES      |
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Create Address Book Group request
            examples:
              SAMPLE REQUEST:
                value: >-
                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                  <f1:access-point-opers-request xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 EndPointOperations.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                          <f1:MODIFY>
                          <f1:endpoint endpointtype="google.portal" endpointid="google.portal^sandra@gmail.com">
                              <f1:autopromote-endpoints>
                                  <f1:autopromote-endpoint autopromote="true" endpointtype="yahoo.portal" endpointid="yahoo.portal^sandra@yahoo.com"/>
                              </f1:autopromote-endpoints>
                          </f1:endpoint>

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/ab/rollback:
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post address book rollback pending 69 not executed
      description: "This method is used to post the rollback request to the server for specified number of days. User can rollback his addressbook changes to configured number of days. The number of days allowed for rollback is : [-1,0,1,2,8,15,30]. -1 specifies to undo the rollback done previously in case no contact changes were synced after rollback operation."
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416

          in: header
          schema:
            type: string

          in: header

            type: string

            type: string

          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET

          in: header

            type: string

            Basic

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/ab/rollback/{rollbackId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get address book rollback by rollback id pending 70 not excecuted
      description: This method is used to get the snapshot of particular days. Snapshot response has the addessbook changes made during the specified number of days.It shows the contact - adds, updates and deletes.
        snapshotid is the report id returned in snapshotreport-add-response.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: rollbackId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            1234gdg4588978974gggg7
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Get snapshot response by snapshot id success response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get snapshot response by snapshot id success response
              examples:
                Pending:
                  summary: Rollback processing pending
                  value: >-

                        <f1:status>
                          <f1:code>6000</f1:code>
                          <f1:msg>Pending</f1:msg>
                        </f1:status>
                      </f1:session>
                    </f1:rollback-get-response>
                Inprogress:
                  summary: Rollback processing in-progress
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <f1:rollback-get-response userid="" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 RollBackSessionGetResponse.xsd ">
                      <f1:session id="1234gdg4588978974gggg7">
                        <f1:status>
                          <f1:code>6001</f1:code>
                          <f1:msg>Inprogress</f1:msg>
                        </f1:status>
                      </f1:session>
                    </f1:rollback-get-response>
                Completed:
                  summary: Rollback processing completed
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <f1:rollback-get-response userid="" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 RollBackSessionGetResponse.xsd ">
                      <f1:session id="1234gdg4588978974gggg7">

                      </f1:session>
                    </f1:rollback-get-response>

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/ab/snapshot:
    summary: This API allows the ability to get a snapshot report which is contact history of all changes that user has made to addressbook in specified number of days.
      User can rollback the addressbook changes to certain day based on snapshot result.
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: post address book snapshot pending 71 not excecuted
      description: This method is used for for posting the snapshot report request to Server. The number of days to obatin addressbook snapshot is specified in the request.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Create Address Book Group request
            examples:
              SAMPLE REQUEST:
                value: >-
                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                  <f1:snapshot-report-add-request xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 SnapShotReportAddRequest.xsd ">
                    <f1:snapshot>
                      <f1:interval number="1" unit="day"/>
                    </f1:snapshot>
                  </f1:snapshot-report-add-request>
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Post create Address Book response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Post create shares by share id members success response
              examples:
                Pending:
                  summary: Snapshot processing pending
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <f1:snapshot-report-add-response userid="0123455789" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 SnapShotReportAddResponse.xsd ">
                      <f1:report id="1234gdg4588978974gggg7">
                        <f1:status>
                          <f1:code>6000</f1:code>
                          <f1:msg>Pending</f1:msg>
                        </f1:status>
                      </f1:report>
                    </f1:snapshot-report-add-response>
                Inprogress:
                  summay: Snapshot processing in-progress
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <f1:snapshot-report-add-response userid="0123455789" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 SnapShotReportAddResponse.xsd ">
                      <f1:report id="1234gdg4588978974gggg7">
                        <f1:status>

                      <f1:report id="1234gdg4588978974gggg7">
                        <f1:status>
                          <f1:code>6002</f1:code>
                          <f1:msg>Completed</f1:msg>
                        </f1:status>
                      </f1:report>

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/ab/snapshot/{snapshotId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get address book snapshot snapshotId pending 72 not executed
      description: This method is used to get the snapshot of particular days. Snapshot response has the addessbook changes made during the specified number of days.It shows the contact - adds, updates and deletes.
        snapshotid is the report id returned in snapshotreport-add-response.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: snapshotId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            2676a16e018a100080124528f8110228
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic

          description: Get snapshot response by snapshot id success response

              schema:
                type: object

                  name: Get snapshot response by snapshot id success response

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/extshares/{shareId}/contacts:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get share link contacts 74 not executed pending
      description: This method is used for retrieving shareLink contacts.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:

          required: true

            type: string

          description: Specifies index of the starting contact item after sorting
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 0
        - name: maxnum
          description: "Specifies maximum number of contact items to fetch after sorting.\n\n
                        NOTE:\n\n 
                        1.Range Filtering is requested through the query parameters \"rangebegin\" and \"maxnum\" Example: rangebegin=0&maxnum=20"

          required: false

            type: string
          example: 20

          in: header

            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==

            type: string

            Basic

    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post create share link contacts 82 not executed pending
      description: |
        This method is used for adding items to shareLinks
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416

          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==

          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        description: |
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES     | DESCRIPTION                  | REQUIRED |
          |----------|----------------|------------------------------|----------|
          | share    | expirationDate | Expiration Date of the Share | NO       |
          | share    | shareid        | id of the share              | yes      |
          | share    | visibility     | private/public               | yes      |
          | item     | itemid         | item guid of the contact     | yes      |
          | item     | resourceid     | id of the resource           | yes      |
          | item     | type           | type of the item             | yes      |
          | member   | contactid      | id of the contact            | yes      |
          | member   | memberid       | id of the member             | yes      |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Create Address Book Group request
              example: >-
                <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

                    <f1:member contactid="d72caaa808749440b9c420cd0e25e6da" memberid="m1"/>
                  </f1:share>
                </f1:sharelinks-add-req>

        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        description: |
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES     | DESCRIPTION                  | REQUIRED |
          |----------|----------------|------------------------------|----------|
          | delete   | expirationDate | expiration Date of the share | NO       |
          | delete   | shareid        | id of the share              | YES      |
          | delete   | visibility     | private/public               | YES      |
          | modify   | expirationDate | expiration Date of the share | NO       |
          | modify   | shareid        | id of the share              | YES      |
          | modify   | visibility     | private/public               | YES      |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: Create Address Book Group request
            examples:
              MODIFY SHARELINKS:
                description: Add items to the shareLinks
                value: >-
                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                  <f1:sharelinks-oper-req xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 ShareLinksOpersRequest.xsd ">
                    <f1:modify>
                      <f1:share shareid="12345789023343243534543" visibility="private">
                        <f1:item itemid="59f9a25709b1f849908dd2bc5b1dad55" resourceid="c1" type="contact"/>
                        <f1:member contactid="59f9a25709b1f849908dd2bc5b1dad55" memberid="m1"/>
                      </f1:share>
                    </f1:modify>
                  </f1:sharelinks-oper-req>
              DELETE SHARELINKS:
                description: Delete items in the sharelinks
                value: >-
                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                  <f1:sharelinks-oper-req xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 ShareLinksOpersRequest.xsd ">
                    <f1:delete>
                      <f1:share shareid="12345789023343243534543" visibility="private">
                        <f1:item itemid="59f9a25709b1f849908dd2bc5b1dad55" resourceid="c1" type="contact"/>
                        <f1:member contactid="59f9a25709b1f849908dd2bc5b1dad55" memberid="m1"/>
                      </f1:share>
                    </f1:delete>
                  </f1:sharelinks-oper-req>

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/notifications:
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post pin notify/notification Preference 84 85 pending
      description: "This method is used for notifying the user his PIN via sms or email. This API is a generic API for sending notifications to the user and currently only supports sending PIN notifications. Notifications can be sent to the user via sms or email. A notification of sms or email type can be specified. It is the responsibility of the client to generate a unique id for the requested notification. This API makes use of the phone number and email address on the account provided while provisioning the account. This API also allows sending the account PIN encoded as access code via SMS. Sending the account PIN encoded as access code via e-mail is not supported. This API also allows to send text message as SMS .\n\n
                    Status about each of the notification is returned in the response and is identified by the specified notification id."
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES specific to the operations performed
          | ELEMENTS     | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION                                               | REQUIRED |
          |--------------|------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|----------|
          | Notification | password   | Holds type, id & optional format                          |          |
          | Notification | message    | Holds type,id,from,text & format                          |          |
          | password     | type       | Notification type email or sms                            | YES      |
          | password     | id         | Notification id                                           | YES      |
          | password *   | format     | Format for password which is PIN, accesscode, text, or id | NO       |
          | message      | type       | Notification type email,sms, or register                  | YES      |
          | message      | id         | Notification id                                           | YES      |
          | message *    | format     | Format for password which is text                         | Yes      |
          | message      | from       | Originator address/name                                   | No       |
          | message      | text       | text needs to be sent as a SMS                            | Yes      |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: update password request
            examples:
                Send PIN via SMS or e-mail:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <f1:notify-request xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 NotificationRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                        <f1:notifications>
                            <f1:password type="email" id="1234"/>
                            <f1:password type="sms" id="4567"/>
                        </f1:notifications>
                    </f1:notify-request>
                Send Access code via SMS:
                  description: Please note that trying to send access code through e-mail is not supported and will result in an error.
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <!--Sample XML file generated by XMLSpy v2009 (http://www.altova.com)-->
                    <f1:notify-request xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 NotificationRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                        <f1:notifications>
                            <f1:password type="sms" id="4567" format="accesscode" />
                            <f1:password type="email" id="1234" format="accesscode" />
                        </f1:notifications>
                    </f1:notify-request>
                Send Text Message via SMS:
                  description: Please note that trying to send access code through e-mail is not supported and will result in an error.
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <f1:notify-request xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 NotificationRequest.xsd ">
                      <f1:notifications>
                        <f1:message format="text" from="MightyPhone" id="1234" text=" Migration is complete.Life will be good." type="sms"/>
                      </f1:notifications>
                    </f1:notify-request>
                Register Google GCM registration ID for push notifications:
                  description: Please note that trying to send access code through e-mail is not supported and will result in an error.
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <f1:notify-request xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 NotificationRequest.xsd">
                        <f1:notifications>
                            <f1:password id="a234hhj3-1000-3748-asdf-184983091234" type="register" format="id"/> <!-- This id is Google Reg ID -->
                        </f1:notifications>
                    </f1:notify-request>
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: X-F1-Client-Method
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: vzwselects
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: update password response
              examples:
                Send PIN via SMS or e-mail response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:notify-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="NotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:password id="1234">
                                <ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                                <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                            </ns1:password>
                            <ns1:password id="4567">
                                <ns1:code>4127</ns1:code>
                                <ns1:msg>Notification Sending denied</ns1:msg>
                            </ns1:password>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:notify-response>
                Send Access Code via SMS response:
                  description: Please note that trying to send access code through e-mail is not supported.
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:notify-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="NotificationResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:password id="4567">
                                <ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                                <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                                <ns1:accesscode>xdsqweyh</ns1:accesscode>
                            </ns1:password>
                            <ns1:password id="1234">
                                <ns1:code>4170</ns1:code>
                                <ns1:msg>Invalid access code notification request for e-mail type</ns1:msg>
                            </ns1:password>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:notify-response>

                  description: Please note that trying to send text message through e-mail is not supported.
                  value: >-

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/prefs/password:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Prefs Password 86
      description: This method is used for retrieving the account password.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943412
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get password
              examples:
                Success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-get-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordGetResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:password>pass@123</ns1:password>
                    </ns1:acct-password-get-response>
        '301':
          description: User is in Different PU
        '400':
          description: Bad Url Syntax
        '401':
          description: Authentication Failed
        '403':
          description: Authorization Failed
        '404':
          description: Resource Not Found
        '405':
          description: Method Not Found
        '409':
          description: Resource access Conflict
        '422':
          description: Bad Request Semantics
        '500':
          description: Internal Server Error
    put:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Put Prefs Password 87
      description: "This method is used for modify/reset the account password . When a password is specified in the modify request the password is set to the specified password for that account.\n\n
                    When a empty password is provided, the password is reset to a random password and returned to the user in the response. Please note that FusionOne system does not allow setting password to empty password. Trying to do so will set the password to a random password.\n\n
                    Please note that in both the cases, whether modifying the password or resetting the password is a mandatory field. It either has a value or it is empty.\n\n
                    One of the disadvantages of this method is that it is not a secure way of resetting the password. The password which is reset is returned to the user. If you need a secure way of resetting the password please use the HTTP DELETE version of this API."
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES specific to the operations performed
          | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION      | REQUIRED |
          |----------|------------|------------------|----------|
          | password |            | Account Password | YES      |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: update password request
            examples:
                SAMPLE REQUEST MODIFY PASSWORD:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <!--Sample XML file generated by XMLSpy v2009 (http://www.altova.com)-->
                    <f1:acct-password-modify-request xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 AccountPasswordModifyRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                        <f1:password>1234</f1:password>
                    </f1:acct-password-modify-request>
                SAMPLE REQUEST RESET PASSWORD:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <!--Sample XML file generated by XMLSpy v2009 (http://www.altova.com)-->
                    <f1:acct-password-modify-request xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 AccountPasswordModifyRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                        <f1:password></f1:password>
                    </f1:acct-password-modify-request>

      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943412
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: update password response
              examples:
                SAMPLE RESPONSE MODIFY PASSWORD:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                      <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                      <ns1:password>1234</ns1:password>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
                SAMPLE RESPONSE RESET PASSWORD:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                        <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                        <ns1:password>4278</ns1:password>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
                SAMPLE RESPONSE FOR SSO ENABLED DEVICES:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-delete-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordDeleteResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>4204</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Pin operations are disabled for the account due to presence of SSO enabled devices</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:acct-password-delete-response>
        '301':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: update password response
              examples:
                User is in Different PU:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:msg>User is in Different PU</ns1:msg>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
        '400':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: update password response
              examples:
                Invalid Account password to update:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:code>4122</ns1:code>
                      <ns1:msg>Invalid Account password to update</ns1:msg>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
        '401':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: update password response
              examples:
                Unsupported HTTP Authentication:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:code>4007</ns1:code>
                      <ns1:msg>Unsupported HTTP Authentication</ns1:msg>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
                User is not authorized to access data:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:code>4008</ns1:code>
                      <ns1:msg>User is not authorized to access data</ns1:msg>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
        '422':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: update password response
              examples:
                xml is not valid:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:code>4010</ns1:code>
                      <ns1:msg>xml is not valid</ns1:msg>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
                Account password update failed:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:code>4121</ns1:code>
                      <ns1:msg>Account password update failed</ns1:msg>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
                Account password field is mandatory while modifying account password:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:code>4123</ns1:code>
                      <ns1:msg>Account password field is mandatory while modifying account password</ns1:msg>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
                Pin operations are disabled for the account due to presence of SSO enabled devices:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:code>4204</ns1:code>
                      <ns1:msg>Pin operations are disabled for the account due to presence of SSO enabled devices</ns1:msg>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
        '500':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: update password response
              examples:
                Internal Server Error:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-modify-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordModifyResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:code>4001</ns1:code>
                      <ns1:msg>Internal Server Error</ns1:msg>
                    </ns1:acct-password-modify-response>
    delete:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Delete Prefs Password 88
      description: "This method is used for delete/resetting the account password. The reset parameter will send in request URL. Setting reset to true will reset the password. Setting reset to false currently does not have any effect in the system. It is reserved for future use in system which supports setting empty passwords. Currently Synchronoss system does not allow empty passwords and so reset=false is not a valid option. User must set reset to true always.\n\n
                    One of the advantages of this method is that it is secure when used with the parameter reset set to true. When used in this way, the reset password is never exposed to the user."
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943412
        - name: reset
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
          example: true
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: delete password response
              examples:
                Success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-delete-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordDeleteResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:status>
                        <ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                        <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                      </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:acct-password-delete-response>
                SAMPLE RESPONSE FOR SSO ENABLED DEVICES:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:acct-password-delete-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="AccountPasswordDeleteResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:status>
                            <ns1:code>4204</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Pin operations are disabled for the account due to presence of SSO enabled devices</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:status>
                    </ns1:acct-password-delete-response>
        '301':

                type: object

                  name: delete password response

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/prefs:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get Prefs 89
      description: This method is used for retrieving the preferences for the user
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943412
        - name: attribute
          description: |
            Obtains the preferences filtered by attribute name like cos,timezone
            PREFERENCE ATTRIBUTES NAME AND DESCRIPTION
            The following are preference attributes and descriptions
            | NAME                           | VALUE                                                                                                 |
            |--------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
            | cos(read only)                 | Premium or Basic user                                                                                 |
            | timezone                       | List of Valid TimeZone                                                                                |
            | server.realtime.sync           | Synchronization preference – real-time or periodic (applicable for users with premium users COS only) |
            | nab.share.notification.enabled | Allow share invitation from others (flag)                                                             |
            | nab.buddy.notification.enabled | Allow buddy invitations from others (flag)                                                            |
            | allowedsmsmessages             | Allow the user to send a PIN to phone in an SMS                                                       |
            | nab.account.id.hidden          | Preference to set the account visibility                                                              |
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: cos
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basick
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: preferences get response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: preferences get response
              examples:
                Success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
                    <ns1:preferences-get-response xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xsi:schemaLocation="PreferencesGetResponse.xsd">
                      <ns1:f1account userid="15782943412">
                        <ns1:preferences>
                          <ns1:attributes itemcount="6">
                            <ns1:attribute name="cos" value="ba"/>
                            <ns1:attribute name="timezone" value="3137"/>
                            <ns1:attribute name="server.realtime.sync" value="off"/>
                            <ns1:attribute name="nab.buddy.notification.enabled" value="false"/>
                            <ns1:attribute name="allowedsmsmessages" value="true"/>
                            <ns1:attribute name="nab.share.notification.enabled" value="false"/>
                            <ns1:meta>
                              <ns1:partial-data>false</ns1:partial-data>
                              <ns1:content-len>6</ns1:content-len>
                            </ns1:meta>
                          </ns1:attributes>
                        </ns1:preferences>
                      </ns1:f1account>
                    </ns1:preferences-get-response>
        '301':
          description: User is in Different PU
        '400':
          description: Bad Url Syntax
        '401':
          description: Authentication Failed
        '403':
          description: Authorization Failed
        '404':
          description: Resource Not Found
        '405':
          description: Method Not Found
        '409':
          description: Resource access Conflict
        '422':
          description: Bad Request Semantics
        '500':
          description: Internal Server Error
    put:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Put Update Prefs 90
      description: This method is used for modifying the preferences for the user account.
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS  | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION            | REQUIRED |
          |-----------|------------|------------------------|----------|
          | attribute | value      | value of the attribute | YES      |
          | attribute | name       | name of the attribute  | YES      |
          
          PREFERENCE ATTRIBUTES NAME AND VALUE
          The following preference attributes are available for modification
          | NAME                           | VALUE                  |
          |--------------------------------|------------------------|
          | timezone                       | List of Valid TimeZone |
          | server.realtime.sync           | on or off              |
          | nab.share.notification.enabled | true or false          |
          | nab.buddy.notification.enabled | true or false          |
          | allowedsmsmessages             | true or false          |
          | nab.account.id.hidden          | true or false          |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: preferences operations request
              example: >-
                <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                <f1:preferences-operations xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 F:\Divya\FusionOneSVN\server\branches\java\wsg-nab\src\main\schema\preferences\PreferencesOperationsRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                        <f1:MODIFY>
                                <f1:attribute value="false" name="allowedsmsmessages"/>
                        </f1:MODIFY>
                </f1:preferences-operations>
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943412
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/ab/recycle/contacts/{contactId}/picture/{pictureId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get address book contacts conatct id picture picture id 91
      description: |
        This method is used for retrieving the picture for a contact in recycle bin. It should be noted that the picture id can be obtained from the contact itself which has the picture id as a photo reference field.

        Users should specify the picture id in the URL. The browser will be able to cache the image based in this URL. Whenever the picture changes the picture id will also change. This should cause the browser to load the picture again.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: size
          description: Retrieves the picture with specified size
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 100x200
        - name: imagetype
          description: Retrieves the picture with specified type Default is na.
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: png
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Get address book recycle contacts by contact id picture id response
          content:
            image/png:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: Get address book recycle contacts by contact id picture id response
              examples:
                success response:
                  description: |
                    HTTP HEADERS This call will also return in the response the following HTTP headers.

                    | HEADER        | SAMPLE VALUE                  |
                    |---------------|-------------------------------|
                    | Expires       | Tue, 19 Jan 2038 03:14:00 GMT |
                    | Cache-Control | max-age=877853160             |
        '301':
          description: User is in Different PU
        '400':
          description: Bad Url Syntax
        '401':
          description: Authentication Failed
        '403':
          description: Authorization Failed
        '404':
          description: Resource Not Found
        '405':
          description: Method Not Found
        '409':
          description: Resource access Conflict
        '422':
          description: Bad Request Semantics
        '500':
          description: Internal Server Error
  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/ab/recycle/contacts:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Get address book recycle contacts 92
      description: |
        This method is used for retrieving all the recycle bin contacts
        
        NOTE :
        1. Strings are compared case-insensitive.
        2. For parameter field-tag.type any field name excluding the index can be specified.
        3. Both the prefix and suffix wildcards are allowed as well, indicating substring
        match - e.g. *123*.
        4. Date&Time values are compared in full. That is, no substring matching for them.
        5. A Boolean existential expression is supplied by omitting the value part -
        e.g. &tel.mobile& evaluates to true of mobile phone number exists.
        6. A Boolean non-existential expression is supplied by appending a tilde (~)
        to the existential expression.
        E.g. &~tel.mobile& evaluates to true if a mobile phone number does not exist.
        7. Only one of ascending or descending sort can be requested.
        8. Range Filtering is requested through the query parameters "rangebegin"
        and "maxitems"
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: fields
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            all:
              value: all
            firstname:
              description: Obtains the contact with fields specified.
              value: firstname #comma separated field names
          description: Obtains the contact with all fields
        - name: name
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: F1
          description: Filter the contacts by a name field
        - name: email
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: email
          description: Filter the contacts by a email field
        - name: im
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: john
          description: Filter the contacts by a Im field
        - name: address
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sunnyvale
          description: Filter the contacts by a Address field
        - name: url
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: john
          description: Filter the contacts by a Url field
        - name: tel
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 15782943416
          description: Filter the contacts by a Tel field
        - name: address.home #field-tag.type
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: home
          description: Filter the contacts by specified field type
        - name: address.home.street  #address.type.subfield
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: washington
          description: Filter the contacts by subfield of the address fields
        - name: sort-asc
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: firstname
          description: Sort the contacts according to the field and ascending order specified
        - name: sort-desc
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: firstname
          description: Sort the contacts according to the field and descending order specified
        - name: rangebegin
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 0  #sort-asc=lastname,firstname&rangebegin=0&maxnum=20
          description: Specifies index of the starting contact item after sorting
        - name: maxnum
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 20
          description: Specifies maximum number of contact items to fetch after sorting
        - name: contactids
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: cd5f85270126100081df3cb040b88554,cd5f85270126100081df3sdc45b88554
          description: Specifies a list of comma seperated contact ids
        - name: ff
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: exclude
          description: Specifies whether fields should be excluded or included. Values can be exclude or include. Default is include.
        - name: size
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 100x200
          description: Retrieves the contact's image with specified size
        - name: imagetype
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: png
          description: Retrieves the contact's image with specified type
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic

          description: get deleted contacts response

              schema:

      description: This method is used for undeleting the contacts from recycle bin and deleting the contacts permanently.
      requestBody:
        description: |

          | ELEMENTS | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION     | REQUIRED |

          | contact  | id         | contact-id      | OPTIONAl |

          | contact  | version    | contact version | OPTIONAL |

                        <f1:contact id="6886e444018a1000804b19694a8e19d6" tempid="1" version="4"/>
                    </f1:DELETE>

                    </f1:UNDELETE>
                </f1:deleted-contacts-operations>

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/syncStatus:
    description: This API provides the information about both NAB and Middle are in sync or not.
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post create sync status pending not excecuted 94
      description: This method is used for retrieving sync status for userId. It checks both middle->wsg and wsg->middle sync status.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      responses:
        '200':
          description: |
            This call allows user to add a sync for specific endpoints or all user endpoints(if syncAll attribute is 'true').
            
            | ELEMENTS            |        DESCRIPTION                                                                                                                                                                 |        VALUES                                       |
            |---------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
            |        code         |        If  http status code is 200 then only   this response xml come with proper code and msg                                                                                     |        application status codes                     |
            |        msg          | If  http status code is 200 then only this   response xml come with proper code and msg                                                                                            |        message relevant to application status code  |
            |        applyChanges |        It defines whether middle->wsg is in-sync or not.It is false if   middle->wsg is in-sync otherwise true, means some changes there in middle   which are not applied to wsg. |        true/false                                   |
            |        dumpChanges  | It   defines whether wsg->middle is in-sync or not.It is false if   wsg->middle is in-sync otherwise true, means some changes there in wsg   which are not applied to middle.      |        true/false                                   |
            |        synced       | It   depends on applyChanges & dumpChanges. If both are false then it is true   otherwise false.                                                                                   |        true/false                                   |
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                xml:
                  name: sync status response
              examples:
                success response:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:sync-status-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" userid="19045645645" xsi:schemaLocation="SyncStatusGetResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:sync-status>
                            <ns1:code>4000</ns1:code>
                            <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                            <ns1:applyChanges>true</ns1:applyChanges>
                            <ns1:dumpChanges>true</ns1:dumpChanges>
                            <ns1:synced>true</ns1:synced>
                        </ns1:sync-status>
                    </ns1:sync-status-response>
                Success:
                  value: >-
                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                    <ns1:sync-status-response xmlns:ns1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" userid="19045645645" xsi:schemaLocation="SyncStatusGetResponse.xsd">
                        <ns1:sync-status>
                            <ns1:msg>Success</ns1:msg>
                        </ns1:sync-status>

  /wsg/public/nab/v1/{userId}/websessions:
    post:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: Post create websessions pending not executed 95
      description:  |
        This method is used for starting or ending a web session. If the user is connecting to Synchronoss system for the very first time, it is possible that Synchronoss system may have to populate the user data in to Web Services Gateway database. Since such a data transfer takes some time, a special success code HTTP 202 is sent back to client to indicate that a first time data transfer is in progress.

        The client can then choose to wait for the data to be transferred to WSG and then go on to do a getContacts call. When the data is transferred a notification will be sent for the user to indicate that transfer is complete.

        This allows clients to display a message to the user while data is being transferred.

        If for some reason a data transfer fails then a failure notification is sent. This allows the client to display a error message to the user.

        The start session call can be repeatedly called without any problem. As long as the user data is not transferred the success code will be 202. Once the data is transferred successfully, start session will always return HTTP 200.

        This API allows you to start multiple web sessions with Synchronoss. Different sessions must have different session id. Each session started must be ended with the end session. A maximum of five sessions can be started. If a timeout is not specified in the start session command, a default timeout will be used. The default timeout is for an hour. A session can be renewed by starting it again. Since the sessions times out after the timeout the clients must make sure to return the timeouts.

        Recycling of websessions is supported by an attribute in wsg called websessions.recycle. If this property is set to false then an error will be obtained once the maximum number of sessions is exceeded. If this property is set to true then the oldest session is replaced with the new session.
      security:
        - basicAuth: [ ]
      parameters:
        - name: userId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            15782943416
        - name: echo
          description: Contains the echo data recieved from the request
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: session tracking information from the client
        - name: X-F1-Client-Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            YVdOekxuQnZjblJoYkRwcFkzTmZZMnhwWlc1MFgybGs6aWNzX2NsaWVudF9wYXNzd29yZA==
        - name: Authorization-domain
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sncr.token
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/xml
        - name: X-Client-SNCR-Platform
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: HANDSET
        - name: Authorization
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: >-
            Basic
            
      requestBody:
        description: |
          INPUT ELEMENTS AND ATTRIBUTES
          
          The input should have the following ELEMENTS or ATTRIBUTES
          | ELEMENTS  | ATTRIBUTES | DESCRIPTION                      | REQUIRED |
          |-----------|------------|----------------------------------|----------|
          | operation | sessionid  | Session Id of websession         | OPTIONAL |
          | operation | timeout    | Timeout of websession in seconds | OPTIONAL |
          | operation | command    | Websession command start/end     | YES      |
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              type: object
              xml:
                name: websession operations request
            examples:
              SAMPLE REQUEST - start a web session:
                description: This sample request will start a web session for the user with a timeout value of one hour.
                value: >-
                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                  <!--Sample XML file generated by XMLSpy v2009 (http://www.altova.com)-->
                  <f1:websession-operations xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1 F:\Divya\referenceDocs\FusionOne\WebServices\Pegasus\NAB-APPS\wsg-nab\src\main\schema\contacts\WebSessionsOperationsRequest.xsd" xmlns:f1="http://www.fusionone.com/xmlns/f1" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
                      <f1:operation sessionid="ICS19780149670" timeout="3600" command="start"/>
                  </f1:websession-operations>
              SAMPLE REQUEST - stop a web session:

                      <f1:operation sessionid="ICS19780149670" command="end"/>
                  </f1:websession-operations>
